resources.string:
Hi,Am Antoinette 

I love food...like food makes me really really happy 

Dont get me wrong...I dislike people but I love food very much 

I bet you are wondering if I say I love food so whats my favorite meal 

Well I cant deny how I love snacking alot but I just cant decide on a favorite meal it literallly depends on how am feeling 

I know that is fucking brilliant
